rules_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Permanents you control with mana value less than that card's mana value gain indestructible until end of turn. Exile Defy Despair.
flavor_text: [i]“You thought it'd be that easy? He never gave up on me! I'm not giving up on him! I [/i]know[i] there's more to this, and I'll find it myself!”[/i]
notes:
!tag:Vasille
!tag:Dajaman

“You thought it'd be that easy to fool me? Now I know there's more to this, and I'm not letting you stop me from finding it!
